name: brad ohukno
text: Been waiting for our order for an hour and 15 mins and its still not here. Never again will I call pizza hut in lewisburg pa. This kind of wait is unacceptable. This isn't the first issue ive had here either.  The management here definitely needs improvement.

name: Amanda Lyons
text: We got the supreme pizza and stuffed crust pepperoni pizza for the kids and everyone loved it! I couldn't ask for better pizza!

name: Carol J Good
text: It was a nice drive.  Ordered our pizza and sodas.  Great pizza!!

name: Louann King
text: The girl that was getting my order was great

name: Shawn Fisher
text: Pizza hut anywhere is pretty much the same, but always good

name: Melanie Hackenberg
text: Always great ....

name: Vicki Caldwell
text: Fast service.  We needed a quick stop on our day long trip.

name: Amanda Bossert
text: The dining area could be updated. It's just blah looking. The dining area lighting is low but I loved that part of it!The food however is fantastic!!

name: Jenna Rose Chloe`
text: Grabbed some Grub before heading home. Went @3 today. The lady was nice & friendly!

name: Crystal Criley
text: A friend and I went to eat at this restaurant after being disgusted with Shamokin dam PizzaHut (we waited over 20 mins and never waited on). We was Sat down an waited on right away an the customer service was excellent and friendly, we …More

name: Rachel Gallo
text: The staff there are so friendly and accommodating. It was the absolute best service I've ever recieved at a Pizza hut whether in store or on the phone. They definitely made my experiences great and always outdo my expectations. (:

name: Gary Bachman
text: I loved the service and very well attended to The waitresses was very pleasant and the food was delicious. Good atmosphere. Thank you for the good service Pizza Hut.

name: Bob and Vera Bowen
text: Food was good. Server very pleasant and efficient but facility was very shabby and in need of renovation. No lights on outside including no parking lot lights. We wondered if they were open. Was told sign had not worked for some time.

name: Amber Miller
text: Fast service, excellent pizza

name: Matt Zimmerman
text: Food wasnt bad. Service wasnt to awful. But the employees in the back screaming about eating ass in the kitchen was kinda unsettling

name: Matthew Roslevich
text: Sometimes, you get lucky, sometimes service is eh. The one time I went there and they were really backed up due to issues with something in the kitchen. We were there 2.5 hours. We were patient. Other patrons were very impatient (ordered …More

name: Rich Morgan
text: This was the most horrable experience we ever had. The dough was very tough and  the dough tasted old. Breadsticks very old as well will not return

name: Michael
text: Kind dirty. Not the best pizza hut in the area. Go to selinsgrove instead

name: Ken Long
text: Recent renewing of the wooden table tops is something that was badly needed.  Glad it was done.  Tuesday for spaghetti with meat sauce - very good.  Pizza is pizza hut standard and served piping hot.

name: John Peachey
text: Great family deal, 2 medium pizzas, bread sticks is salad and drinks included. Serves 4 . Only $30.

text: Great food @ Good price. (Big dinner box)

text: The food was good, but the building needs a major remodel!!!!! Some places (especially wooden) looked old and worn.

name: Logan Showers
text: It's pizza so obviously this place is VERY good.

name: Sanford Potter
text:
Worst Pizza Hut I have ever been in.
This negative review is NOT an attempt to get something for free or my money back! I just people to know just how PATHETIC this location is. …More

text: Delicious and great service

name: Judith Walter
text: We always get good service and good pizza here. They do a great job!

name: Matt Poremsky
text: Not one of our better trips here.  Although the waitress was very attentive and friendly, the pizza was extremely greasy.  You will expect some from a pan pizza with pepperoni, but this was pretty bad.  So much so that my wife couldn't …More

name: Harry Evans
text: We went there years ago found pizza to be very greasy , but thought we would try it again and it was better , the pizza was good this time .my wife got the chicken Alfredo.she said it was good but it can be hit and miss .the only thing I …More

name: out and about with Don
text: Great pizza ,friendly staff, good prices, very clean, just cant say enough, keep up the great work pizza hut.

name: Michel Fournelle
text: A classic, you know what you get at the Hut. Salad bar was fresh and our server was great.

name: Sharon
text: Love their pizza

name: britch999
text: Lewisburg pizza has won the worst burnt pizza ever award. Completely inedible but I had my poor hungry kids grabbing pizza out of the box while I was trying to take pictures of how terrible it was.

name: Xeno Deo
text: Every time I call for delivery the people that answer are very rude and sarcastic. I simply gave them my phone number wrong and when I politely said I did so, the person on the other line sighed and for the rest of the call gave me tremendous attitude. Absolutely unprofessional.

name: Elvin Zimmerman
text: Messed up my order,, but made it right.

name: Amy Brown
text: Not thrilled! Ordered online for delivery, called after an hour when the food wasn't delivered, they took off an appetizer and extra sauce I ordered from my bill, great, but I never got the sauce. Order shows up an additional 15 min later, and is cold..... pretty disappointed.

name: Marilyn Conrad
text: Pan pizza was perfect.  Waitress, Dixie, was friendly and efficient, despite being very busy!

name: Zana Dalessandro
text: This is a hit or miss place.  Sorry too true.  Not fresh.  Also last time pups would not eat and we both has stomach pains and issues.

text: Great meal with good friends.  Ask for the family special deal.  Our waiter was the best.

name: Donald Peterman

name: Annette Hutt
text: They forgot to cook one of my pizzas and they didn't even offer a discount when I  had to wait an extra 15 minutes for my order. Btw, they really should clean the cobwebs off of the exit sign in the pick up area. Kind of gross.

text: Ordered delivery and neither pizzas had any of the seasonings on they were supposed to. Weren't finished or anything. Looked terrible. Was basically just dough.

text: The pizza was not cooked and it didn't have any of the toppings that a usual specific pizza has. The service was bad and the pizza was over priced I would not go there anytime soon.

name: Herbert Minium
text: When we first went to walk in an employee was standing right by the entrance smoking.  Then when she walked into the restrauant the whole place reaked of cigarette smoke. Never washed her hands or anything.  Just went on to serve patrons. …More

name: Sarah Neal
text: Waited 50 mins and my pizza still was not done.  Asked for a refund and left.

name: Colleen Krall
text: I was with a group totalling 9. 5 of the people arrived first and ordered our food.  When we arrived the rest of us were told we couldn't sit at the adjoining table and we TOLD  to go sit in a booth near them.  The service was not good.  Food was delivered and no silverware or plates.  I'm not happy that's for sure.

name: Michael Morse
text: Service was the best I've had at a pizza hut in a long time the waitress was polite and courteous ......

name: Jonathan Gallo
text: Mediocre food and had to have it remade. Salad bar had old food.

text: The Manager is one of the only good things here

text: Online ordering is awful...I put in 4 5 pan pizzas, got 5 hand tossed.  $40.. called n they say oh your order shows hand tossed.  So stuck w 5 pizzas....nobody wsnts...never goin again...sticking w domino's!
